channel.title: Scatter Plot on Yedzin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Scatter Plot on Yedzin's Blog

item.title: Scatter Plots
item.description: library(devtools) library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) #Extracting the data------------------------------------- query<-"SELECT playerID,sum(HR) AS career_HR,sum(SO) AS career_SO FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>=400" result<-sqldf(query) # viwualizing the data------------------------------------- ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=career_SO,y=career_HR),size=3,color="pink")+ ggtitle("Career Strikeouts Vs Homeruns for Great Hitters")+ xlab("Career Strike Outs")+ylab("Career Home Runs")
